name: A Taste of TEETH
description:
Hello! Marsh here. I wrote this short bit of interactive fiction as a way to teach myself the Inky scripting tool. So, it's quite a bad game, written without any thought of its actual design, and ends very abruptly. BUT! Maybe it's a fun way to be introduced to the world of TEETH (our fat TTRPG book, to be Kickstarted shortly). Enjoy?

Save often, as there are a few bugs usually resolved by a reset. Sorry - I'm still learning!
